name: Callie Pegadiotes
education: San Diego State University-California State University, Bachelor of Arts (B.A.) in Communication and Media Studies (2007-2009)

experience.title: Producer
experience.description: Producing events such as Hulu Boba Truck Comic Con 2024, Fox Universal Basic Guys Comic Con 2024 & NFL Games 2024, Good Morning America at D23 2024, Fox The Saints presented by Martin Scorcese 2024.

Worked on Google I/O 2023, Olivia Rodrigoâ€™s Vampire Premier Party 2023, YouTube Kids Reunion 2023, Bravocon 2023, Beyond Wonderland 2023, Proper NYE 2023-24, Wild Horses Fest 2023, crssd 2023, Bleached fest 2023, crssd Fall '22, day mvs '22, Under the Big Sky '22, Under the Big Sky '21, Academy of Country Music Awards 2011-2022.

experience.title: Brand Marketing Manager
experience.description: Managed brand and marketing for food & beverage industry. Freelanced with businesses, start-ups, entrepreneurs for brand positioning, social media strategy, design, branded events, campaign planning, budget management.

experience.title: Marketing Advisor

Managed timelines for 5 large agent teams. Optimized marketing processes. Designed marketing materials using Adobe suite.

experience.title: Global Associate Brand Manager, 19 Crimes Wine
experience.description: Launched 8 products in less than 2 years. Maintained double-digit sales growth through product launches and marketing plans. Grew social by 600% in 12 months. Managed relationships with Digital Team. Strategized 360 marketing campaigns. Led global and regional marketing teams. Managed influencer programming.

experience.title: Assistant Brand Marketing Manager, Own Brands Portfolio
experience.description: Executed national marketing campaigns for $11B portfolio. Designed 'New & Exclusive Campaign'. Strategized digital offers on loyalty platforms. Led production of national commercial for O Organics. Creative director on campaign collateral and digital assets.

experience.title: Innovation & Creative Content Producer, Photographer, Food Stylist
experience.description: Led recipe development and content creation for cookbooks. Assisted in product and book launches. Directed external shoots. Managed test kitchen and products for review. Built in-house photography studio. Styled and photographed recipe and product photos. Led production of live/recorded TV segments. Managed nutritional calculations and fact-checked assets.

experience.title: Production Intern
experience.description: Assisted in production of local commercials. Distributed and edited schedules and scripts, Assistant Camera Operator, set up lighting, assistant editor using Final Cut Pro, voice over talent.

bio: I am a seasoned brand marketer turned freelance experiential Producer based in San Diego. I spent the first half of my career immersed in brand management and marketing and then transitioned into the production world where I thrive most and am able to apply my experience of being on the client side to how we pitch and produce experiential events. I also freelance in the music world managing AR onsite for major music festivals. I love collaborating, managing budgets and multitasking. I do best in fast paced environments and love being onsite.
